description: David Skyler is 28 years old and one tall glass of water. He's sitting with our casting agent today to see if he has what it takes to make it into the NDS family. He says that he's been guided towards the adult industry throughout the years and he is finally ready to try it out. He may be straight but he does tell one compelling story of a man on man encounter. Come sit down with David and our casting agent and watch him pull out his big cock and see if he PASSES or FAILS.
title: Casting Audition: David Skyler
